title: Badlands National Park: News Releases
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News     News Releases               News Releases           Subscribe  | What is RSS     June 18, 2015  Badlands Loop Road Hwy 240 to Remain Open  The Badlands Loop Road at Cedar Pass will continue to operate with one lane open.   June 16, 2015  badlands loop road closure delayed 6-16-2015  The Badlands Loop Road at Cedar Pass will not close on Wednesday as planned. Park deputy superintendent Reed Robinson decided to delay the closure at Monday nightâ€™s informational meeting in the Town of Interior.
